text.div:
Example Message Reason Codes

Example Message Reasons. These are the set of codes that might be used an updating an encounter using admin-update.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/message-reasons-encounter defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
admit AdmitThe patient has been admitted.
discharge DischargeThe patient has been discharged.
absent AbsentThe patient has temporarily left the institution.
return ReturnedThe patient has returned from a temporary absence.
moved MovedThe patient has been moved to a new location.
edit EditEncounter details have been updated (e.g. to correct a coding error).

name: Example Message Reason Codes
description: Example Message Reasons. These are the set of codes that might be used an updating an encounter using admin-update.

concept.definition: The patient has temporarily left the institution.
The patient has returned from a temporary absence.
The patient has been moved to a new location.
Encounter details have been updated (e.g. to correct a coding error).
